name: AutoContinue Logic
description: A module for incorporating logic into the autocontinue surveys

versions.1.1.0: Redesign to allow better skipping if multiple instruments are skipped by logic - 2019-03-29

project-settings.name: This module is to be used with surveys and the 'autocontinue' checkbox in survey options. It can be used as an alternative to the Survey Queue and does not require re-programming for each event. If you select and instrument, it will only be displayed IF the logic evaluates to true. If you do not select an instrument it will always be rendered (default).
